title: ADDIE-Based Blended Learning Design for Economic Development Theory and Practical Application

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Economic development education using economic indicator analysis tools in the mathematics domain

learning_goals: Economic growth theories can be applied to mathematical models to analyze key economic indicators.
A project can be completed that designs, analyzes, and evaluates real-world economic cases through each stage of the ADDIE model.
Economic data can be visualized and interpreted using digital tools (Excel, R, etc.).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
